While she eats it in the dream. This dream means the end of the engagement and her fiancé has left her, and God knows best. And whoever sees that he is eating dark chocolate in a dream and enjoying its taste, it is a metaphor for success in study or at work. Seeing losing dark chocolate in the dream of an unmarried girl. Seeing the loss of chocolates in The dream means losing hope in life and perhaps losing money. A man dreams that he is eating spoiled dark chocolate. title: Interpretation of a dream about electric shock according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing an electric shock in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man I dreamed of electricity, I got an electric shock, I got an electric shock, I got electricity A wire and an electric shock The death of a person with electricity, water, a vision meter, and an electrical outlet Ibn Sirin and others Interpretation of electric shock in Dream: An electric shock in a dream from electricity is evidence of major changes in the dreamer’s life. If you dream of electricity, this means that there is a sudden change around you that will not bring you promotion or pleasure. If you are electrocuted, you will face a terrible danger. If you see an electrical cable charged with electricity, this foretells that enemies They will spoil your plans that caused you great anxiety when they were made. To see being exposed to an electric shock means death, and it may also indicate that the visionary will fall into dangers and troubles, and God knows best. In the event that you see land being exposed to an electric shock, this means that the land and its owners will suffer from corruption. If he sees If you dream that you can send a package or send yourself via a wire As quickly as you send a message, it means that you will finally overcome obstacles and be able to use your enemies' plans to advance. If the dreamer sees that he has been electrocuted in a dream, this indicates the dreamer awakening in his faith. An electric shock in a dream also indicates that the dreamer's life will witness Many changes: If the dreamer cries upon seeing an electric shock in a dream, this means that the dreamer will get rid of the worries and problems that the dreamer suffers from in his life. If the dreamer sees that someone he knows has been electrocuted in a dream, then this vision indicates this person’s need for help. In the event that the dreamer sees himself being intentionally electrocuted, this vision indicates that the dreamer desires to repent to God, as well as his desire to make changes in his life in general. It is said that seeing electricity in a dream indicates illness, unhappiness, and exhaustion, or it may indicate To sudden radical changes and rapid developments in the dreamer’s life. A person receiving an electric shock without anyone intervening in a dream is evidence of a great awakening of faith in a person’s life. Electricity in a dream indicates serious illness, death, exhaustion, and the end of the term, or it may indicate a sudden change in his life, such as a job. Or a new position, and if the dreamer sees in a dream an electric shock affecting a large group of people, this indicates a disease or epidemic affecting the people of the place. Interpretation of an electric shock in a dream: When the dreamer sees that he has been electrocuted, this indicates that he will be exposed to problems, judgments, and disagreements with those around him, so he should be careful. And be careful in the matters he deals with. He dreams that his house has been electrocuted, which means the death of the dreamer or one of his family members.

If you dream of electricity, this means that there is a sudden change around you that will not bring you promotion or pleasure If you are electrocuted, you will face a terrible danger If you see an electric cable charged with electricity, this foretells that enemies will spoil your plans that caused you great anxiety when you put them in place. Seeing exposure to an electric shock means death, and it may also indicate that the visionary will fall into dangers and troubles, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees himself being electrocuted intentionally, this vision indicates that the dreamer wants to repent to God, as well as his desire to make changes in his life in general. If the dreamer sees in a dream an electric shock that affects a large group of people, this indicates a disease or epidemic that affects the people of the place. Seeing a bus In a dream, it indicates that the dreamer’s life is full of love, tenderness, and compassion in all his relationships with those around him, such as his family and friends. Seeing a dream on a bus trip for the purpose of travel indicates the viewer’s inability to achieve his goals and aspirations in life. See also: Interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream in Nabulsi? Seeing a dream about a bus trip with good people indicates the abundance of good friends in the dreamer’s life. Seeing in a dream a bus trip with bad people indicates that there are bad people in his life who conspire against him to defeat him. Seeing you leaving the car and driving the bus in The dream indicates that the dreamer will mix with people in the coming period. Seeing a bus exceeding the speed limit in a dream indicates that the viewer is a reckless person and makes all his decisions without thinking about them. Seeing a single woman in a dream Waiting for the bus shows that someone will soon enter her life and propose to her. Dreaming of single people riding the bus with people she knows says that many changes in her life will be the reason for her life to change for the better. Seeing in a dream a single woman feeling afraid on the bus It shows that in the future he will live in a strange place. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car driving with a dead person in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman on a bus in a dream indicates her inability to seize the opportunities that come her way in life. Seeing a married woman driving a bus in a dream indicates her married life. Full of stability and happiness at this time. A married woman sees her husband driving a bus in a dream. It indicates that he will have great opportunities in his field of work. What is the interpretation of seeing a bus in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant bus in a dream indicates that God will grant her a lot of goodness and sustenance. And blessings for her and her family. Seeing a pregnant woman driving a bus in a dream says that her birth process will be comfortable and easy and she will not feel pain.
